text: Aey logon jo iman laye ho, jab tumse kaha jaye ke apni majlison mein kushadgi paida karo(Make room) to jagah kushada kardiya karo, Allah tumhein kushadgi bakhshega. Aur jab tumse kaha jaye ke uth jao to uth jaya karo, tum mein se jo log iman rakhne waley hain aur jinko ilm bakhsha gaya hai, Allah unko buland darje ata farmayega. Aur jo kuch tum karte ho Allah ko uski khabar hai
